messages.subject: I suppose then?...... :)
messages.msgSnippet: I would suppose then that this is why my boys and I joke that they got out of jail free! When we left PS to unschool LOL!!! School s really are like jail s!
messages.messageBody:
I would suppose then that this is why my boys and I joke that they
got out of "jail" free! When we left PS to unschool LOL!!! School's
really are like jail's! :)

So glad we unschool! :)

Patti and the boys (Chris 12, Matthew 7, Anthony 6)

------Original Message-------
Message: 1
Date: Thu, 26 Feb 2004 13:48:09 -0500
From: "Have a Nice Day!" <litlrooh@...>
Subject: Re: Re: climbing -- was Continuum concept and unschoo...

"Children's lives have been evolving in
a way that mirrors the characteristics of the lives of criminals in
prison. They, too, have a roof over their heads, regular meals and
entertainment provided for them, but they are not free to go out. But
children are not criminals."
